resources.string: Hololive Production, or \"Hololive\" for short, is a virtual YouTuber talent agency from Japan. There are currently 52 talents, known as \"Vtubers,\" who livestream a range of activities such as gaming, singing, chatting, drawing, and more. \n\nOf course, you wouldn\'t be taking this quiz if you didn\'t know all that! Let\'s test your Hololive knowledge with a few questions.
What is the name of Hololive\'s parent company?
Which of the following VTubers are part of Hololive? (check all that apply)
What term does Mori Calliope use to refer to her fans?
Which Japanese word is used ironically to describe a VTuber who tries—and fails—to act “pure” and “wholesome?”
Which platforms do Hololive idols stream on? (check all that apply)
All images are property of Cover Corp, sourced from https://en.hololive.tv/
